description: Returns information about an inference component.

parameters.name: InferenceComponentName
parameters.description: The name of the inference component.

nested_items.name: InferenceComponentName
nested_items.description: The name of the inference component.

nested_items.name: InferenceComponentArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the inference component.

nested_items.name: EndpointName
nested_items.description: The name of the endpoint that hosts the inference component.

nested_items.name: EndpointArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the endpoint that hosts the inference component.

nested_items.name: VariantName
nested_items.description: The name of the production variant that hosts the inference component.

nested_items.name: FailureReason
nested_items.description: If the inference component status is Failed, the reason for the failure.

nested_items.name: Specification
nested_items.description: Details about the resources that are deployed with this inference component.

nested_items.name: ModelName
nested_items.description: The name of the SageMaker AI model object that is deployed with the inference component.

nested_items.name: Container
nested_items.description: Details about the container that provides the runtime environment for the model that is deployed with the inference component.

nested_items.name: DeployedImage
nested_items.description: Gets the Amazon EC2 Container Registry path of the docker image of the model that is hosted in this ProductionVariant.

nested_items.name: SpecifiedImage
nested_items.description: The image path you specified when you created the model.

nested_items.name: ResolvedImage
nested_items.description: The specific digest path of the image hosted in this ProductionVariant.

nested_items.name: ResolutionTime
nested_items.description: The date and time when the image path for the model resolved to the ResolvedImage.

nested_items.name: ArtifactUrl
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 path where the model artifacts are stored.

nested_items.name: Environment
nested_items.description: The environment variables to set in the Docker container.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: StartupParameters
nested_items.description: Settings that take effect while the model container starts up.

nested_items.name: ModelDataDownloadTimeoutInSeconds
nested_items.description: The timeout value, in seconds, to download and extract the model that you want to host from Amazon S3 to the individual inference instance associated with this inference component.

nested_items.name: ContainerStartupHealthCheckTimeoutInSeconds
nested_items.description: The timeout value, in seconds, for your inference container to pass health check by Amazon S3 Hosting. For more information about health check, see How Your Container Should Respond to Health Check (Ping) Requests.

nested_items.name: ComputeResourceRequirements
nested_items.description: The compute resources allocated to run the model, plus any adapter models, that you assign to the inference component.

nested_items.name: NumberOfCpuCoresRequired
nested_items.description: The number of CPU cores to allocate to run a model that you assign to an inference component.

nested_items.name: NumberOfAcceleratorDevicesRequired
nested_items.description: The number of accelerators to allocate to run a model that you assign to an inference component. Accelerators include GPUs and Amazon Web Services Inferentia.

nested_items.name: MinMemoryRequiredInMb
nested_items.description: The minimum MB of memory to allocate to run a model that you assign to an inference component.

nested_items.name: MaxMemoryRequiredInMb
nested_items.description: The maximum MB of memory to allocate to run a model that you assign to an inference component.

nested_items.name: BaseInferenceComponentName
nested_items.description: The name of the base inference component that contains this inference component.

nested_items.name: RuntimeConfig
nested_items.description: Details about the runtime settings for the model that is deployed with the inference component.

nested_items.name: DesiredCopyCount
nested_items.description: The number of runtime copies of the model container that you requested to deploy with the inference component.

nested_items.name: CurrentCopyCount
nested_items.description: The number of runtime copies of the model container that are currently deployed.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time when the inference component was created.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The time when the inference component was last updated.

nested_items.name: InferenceComponentStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the inference component.

nested_items.name: LastDeploymentConfig
nested_items.description: The deployment and rollback settings that you assigned to the inference component.

nested_items.name: RollingUpdatePolicy
nested_items.description: Specifies a rolling deployment strategy for updating a SageMaker AI endpoint.

nested_items.name: MaximumBatchSize
nested_items.description: The batch size for each rolling step in the deployment process. For each step, SageMaker AI provisions capacity on the new endpoint fleet, routes traffic to that fleet, and terminates capacity on the old endpoint fleet. The value must be between 5% to 50% of the copy count of the inference component.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: Specifies the endpoint capacity type.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: Defines the capacity size, either as a number of inference component copies or a capacity percentage.

nested_items.name: WaitIntervalInSeconds
nested_items.description: The length of the baking period, during which SageMaker AI monitors alarms for each batch on the new fleet.

nested_items.name: MaximumExecutionTimeoutInSeconds
nested_items.description: The time limit for the total deployment. Exceeding this limit causes a timeout.

nested_items.name: RollbackMaximumBatchSize
nested_items.description: The batch size for a rollback to the old endpoint fleet. If this field is absent, the value is set to the default, which is 100% of the total capacity. When the default is used, SageMaker AI provisions the entire capacity of the old fleet at once during rollback.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: Specifies the endpoint capacity type.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: Defines the capacity size, either as a number of inference component copies or a capacity percentage.

nested_items.name: AutoRollbackConfiguration
nested_items.description: Automatic rollback configuration for handling endpoint deployment failures and recovery.

nested_items.name: Alarms
nested_items.description: List of CloudWatch alarms in your account that are configured to monitor metrics on an endpoint. If any alarms are tripped during a deployment, SageMaker rolls back the deployment.

nested_items.name: AlarmName
nested_items.description: The name of a CloudWatch alarm in your account.
